example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <Tooltip
      size="small"
      content={
        <Text>
          In order to book a trip, you first need to select an itinerary. Select
          the trip that works for you.
        </Text>
      }
    >
      <Button disabled>Book</Button>
    </Tooltip>
    <Tooltip
      size="medium"
      content={
        <Text>
          In order to book a trip, you first need to select an itinerary. Select
          the trip that works for you.
        </Text>
      }
    >
      <Button disabled>Book</Button>
    </Tooltip>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Size
info.description: You can control the maximum width that the tooltip will have on larger screens. By default, the maximum width is medium, but you can constrain it to small for smaller spaces.
